item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Wit beyond measure is a man's greatest treasure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "If a book about failures doesn't sell, is it a success?" -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "Sometimes the road less traveled is less traveled for a reason" -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "A bookstore is one of the only pieces of evidence we have that people are still thinking." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "What I don't understand is how women can pour hot wax on their bodies, let it dry, then rip out every single hair by its root and still be scared of spiders." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I have infinite capacity to do more work as long as you don't mind that my quality approaches zero." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by dilbert
Tanmay. add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Hard work is rewarding. Taking credit for other people's hard work is rewarding and faster." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Murphy's Law
item.description: "The chance of the bread falling with the buttered side down is directly proportional to the cost of the carpet." -- Murphy's Law

item.title: Tanmay. add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Son, if you really want something in this life, you have to work for it. Now quiet! They're about to announce the lottery numbers." -- Matt Groening
